other_tests.findings: 4 focally increased 18F-FDG uptakes around the supraclavicular region; increased 18F-FDG uptakes in bilateral supraclavicular lymph nodes, cervical esophagus, and cervical paraesophageal lymph node; wall thickening of the cervical esophagus suspected to be esophageal cancer.
Diagnosis of squamous cell carcinoma with submucosal invasion.
